settings.title: who we are
settings.text: Plant Beauty Distillery is a division of Plant Industries, which produces a diverse range of plant based products. Plant Industries is a vertically integrated manufacturer and grower with multiple facilities in the Northeastern, United States.

settings.title: the distillery
settings.text: the distillery is located on Cosmetic Farm™. each and every drop of hydrosol for our products is produced at our distillery using our patent pending dual phase distillation process.

settings.title: a new patent-pending breakthrough
settings.text: our patent-pending distillation method captures whole, undamaged plant actives, resulting in a hydrosol – a water saturated with plant actives at peak potency and effectiveness.

the innovation - the beauty breakthough
why facewater works?
why cosmetic water works?

settings.title: patent-pending process
settings.text: many plants contain highly effective energetic compounds capable of working beauty wonders. to really perform, these delicate ingredients must be undamaged and present in ample quantities. our patent pending pre press and low heat vacuum distillation process starts with fresh, healthy plants and ends with a water-based solution that is loaded with whole phytonutrients.

settings.title: distilled to transform your skin on a deeper level
settings.text: by removing bacteria, toxins, ions and minerals during distillation, the water is effectively purified. since water is polar it will seek out ions to bind with and in this "stripped" state, is able to bind to the plant actives more optimally and at a higher concentrations.

settings.title: highly absorbent water-form(ula)s
settings.text: our distillation method preserves the quality, purity, and delivery of full spectrum plant actives. our water form(ulas) are super lightweight and the perfect vehicle to transport these delicate plant actives.

settings.title: plant actives in motion
settings.text: due to its proper molecular structure, the plant actives are able to be absorbed from the surface of the skin (epidermis) and travel into the lower layers of the skin’s cells

settings.title: 01. the prep
settings.text: removes the toxicity of synthetics & impurities (from other products and pollution) and stabilizes the pH balance of your skin so that the plant active ingredients can penetrate

settings.title: 02. the activation
settings.text: once the plant active ingredients penetrate, they stimulate the skin’s natural production of essential collagen and elastin (the building blocks of your skin)

settings.title: 03. the results
settings.text: cells are stimulated and plant actives are able to target specific skin concerns + immediately visible radiance, noticeable skin clearing and long-term youth preserving effects

settings.heading: 100% plant based is different from "natural"
settings.text:
when a formula is 100% plant based it means simply that ALL of the ingredients are derived from plants.

vegan on the other hand just means that there are no animal products. toxic chemicals are vegan – although we know that most vegans would not go near them!

natural is another story: simply put, something “natural” occurs in nature – and is not synthesized in a factory or lab. there are MANY cosmetic ingredients that are considered “natural” but are not skin healthy such as mineral oil and parrafin wax.

settings.heading: way beyond clean
settings.text:
healthy skin starts with eliminating questionable, harmful, and toxic chemicals. all of our products never have these harmful chemicals:

100% plant based formula

no glycols: glycols are derived from petroleum and known to cause irritation

no petrochemicals

no synthetic fragrance

no added dye or color

vegan* & cruelty-free

made by us

no parabens

no phthalates

100% recyclable packaging

*all of our products are vegan with the exception of products containing honey.

settings.title:
zero carbon property 
without offsets
settings.text: lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit, sed do eiusmod tempor incididunt ut labore et dolore magna aliqualorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit, sed do eiusmod tempor incididunt ut labore lorem
100% RECYCLABLE PACKAGING

PET or PETE is the most widely recycled plastic in the world. It is a strong and inert material that is extremely lightweight, making it efficient to transport (less carbon emissions during shipping compared to glass). PET can be picked up through most curbside recycling programs - just make sure to rinse out any remaining product before recycling.
why we use plastic instead of glass bottles

glass may be a sturdier material but only has a lower environmental impact if reused. it also requires more materials and is much heavier, leading to higher emissions, especially from shipping. we chose PET plastic because it is 100% recyclable, super lightweight, and produces significantly less carbon emissions during transport compared to glass bottles.

settings.title: why we use 100% recyclable plastic instead of glass bottles
settings.text:
glass may be a sturdier, "luxe" feeling material but only has a lower environmental impact if reused. it also requires more materials and is much heavier, leading to higher emissions, especially from shipping.

we chose PET plastic because it is 100% recyclable, super lightweight, and produces significantly less carbon emissions during transport compared to glass bottles.

settings.title: MADE BY US
settings.text:
unlike most beauty brands, all of our products are entirely made by us from start to finish. we independently do our own research and development, manufacturing, fulfillment, and distribution. Because of this, we are able to control every aspect of the quality and integrity of our products.

After distillation, the final step of production (finishing, bottling and labeling) takes place at our Greenleaf facility, owned by our parent company, Plant Industries. Greenleaf is located in Allentown, PA and about 20 minutes away from the Distillery.
